jsky.util.gui
Class ProgressPanel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JPanel
                          |
                          +--jsky.util.gui.ProgressPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, StatusLogger
public class ProgressPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, StatusLogger

A panel to display while a download or other background operation is in progress.

This class is designed to be usable from any threadand all GUI access is done synchronously in the event dispatching thread.

See Also:

Parameters:
